articles.description: The LinkedIn post by the Bombay Shaving Company CEO is just the tip of the iceberg - the problems of toxic work culture and poor work-life balance are pervasive and long-standing, say Gen Z employees.
articles.content: For some weeks now, social media has been abuzz with reactions to a viral LinkedIn post by Shantanu Deshpande, CEO of Bombay Shaving Company. In it, the CEO advised freshers to not do rona dhona over… [+5328 chars]

articles.description: Bajaj Auto, Vodafone Idea, Shree Cements, CONCOR, and Hatsun Agro among stocks that shook the most
